lead_paragraph: West Ham United striker Diafra Sakho is set for a six-week spell on the sidelines after injuring his thigh in Sunday's 1-1 Premier League draw at Manchester United.

headline.print_headline: West Ham's Sakho Out for Six Weeks With Thigh Injury
headline.main: West Ham's Sakho Out for Six Weeks With Thigh Injury

snippet: West Ham United striker Diafra Sakho is set for a six-week spell on the sidelines after injuring his thigh in Sunday's 1-1 Premier League draw at Manchester United....
